ratio.name: Image Ratio
ratio.hint: As compared to the token size.

animate.name: Animate Turn Marker?
animate.hint: Use rotation animation on turn marker. (changes may not be visible until a new combat is started)

interval.name: Animation Speed
interval.hint: How fast to animate the rotation if enabled (recommended between 10 and 200)

customDeckImage.name: Custom On Deck Image Path
customDeckImage.hint: Use a custom image instead (leave blank to use a built in image)

deckRatio.name: On Deck Image Ratio
deckRatio.hint: As compared to the token size.

deckAnimate.name: Animate Deck Marker?
deckAnimate.hint: Use rotation animation on Deck marker. (changes may not be visible until a new combat is started)

deckPlayersOnly.name: Only use on deck marker for players?
deckPlayersOnly.hint: Skips npc for on deck marker if enabled

announceTokenName.name: Use Token Name to announce
announceTokenName.hint: If enabled, will use Token name instead of Actor name

announceTurnMarkerAlias.name: Announce as Turn Marker
announceTurnMarkerAlias.hint: If enabled, the chat message will be from Turn Marker instead of the Actor

announcePlayerNames.name: Announce Player Names
announcePlayerNames.hint: If enabled, the chat message will show the names of the players who control the Actor

customImage.name: Custom Image Path
customImage.hint: Use a custom image instead (leave blank to use a built in image)

announce.name: Announce Turns
announce.hint: If enabled, will send a chat message for the new combatant

announceImage.name: Include Token Image
announceImage.hint: If enabled, will include the token image in the turn announcements

startEnabled.name: Enable Start Marker
startEnabled.hint: If enabled, will place a marker at the location a token started its turn

startImage.name: Custom Image Path
startImage.hint: Use a custom image for the start marker (leave blank to use the built in image)
